name: Craig's game made for GLOBAL GAME JAM 2020!
name_original: Craig's game made for GLOBAL GAME JAM 2020!
description:
CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move
X - Pickup / drop objects
Z - Use currently held item

Hold X - skip intro text

Your crew is gone. Only you remain. It's up to you to make sure the ship reaches its destination, just make sure it doesn't burn too much before you get there.

This was my entry for Global Game Jam 2020, where this years theme was Repair. Well, this is a slightly updated build with a difficulty option and a few minor QoL improvements to be exact. If you'd like to play a marginally worse version of this game (?), here's a link to the original version.

The design, programming and art for this entry was done by myself and the music was adapted from a cartridge by Gruber.
